title: Citi Turkey and TOCEV Collaborate to Open 50 Libraries in 50 Provinces
summary: Citi Turkey and TOCEV are collaborating to provide support for education in Turkey. The project is intended to open libraries and deliver books to elementary schools. Having opened 15 libraries since the beginning of the year, Citibank and TOCEV aim to reach 50 schools in 50 provinces by the end of 2012.
tag-1: Citi Turkey and TOCEV Collaborate to Open 50 Libraries in 50 Provinces
tag-3: Citi Turkey and TOCEV are collaborating to provide support for education in Turkey. The project is intended to open libraries and deliver books to elementary schools. Having opened 15 libraries since the beginning of the year, Citibank and TOCEV aim to reach 50 schools in 50 provinces by the end of 2012.
tag-4: The project facilitates building library rooms in schools that are determined by the Turkish Ministry of Education. These libraries are equipped with library tools, instruments, books and computers for keeping an electronic database of books. The books, determined jointly by the Turkish Ministry of Education and TOCEV, are reference books, classics and books intended to inspire a love for reading and improving the imagination.
tag-5: Serra Akcaoglu, CCO, Citi Turkey, said: "As Citi Turkey, we aim to contribute to the communities that we live in. Driven by the notion that reading, an essential milestone towards a modern society, is gained by children during their elementary-school years, we aim to reach those elementary schools around Turkey that need libraries. By providing equipment and tools to support the students, we contribute to the efforts to establish a reading society."
tag-6: Serra Akcaoglu continued: "We are very pleased to unveil our 15th library under this project, which is a product of Citi Turkey and TOCEV collaboration. Our goal is to reach 50 schools at 50 provinces throughout seven regions in Turkey by the end of 2012. Through our collaboration with TOCEV, a foundation which targets to improve the education level and quality of all children in the country with a profound experience, we took a step today to support a reading society with a broad vision."
tag-7: Bade Takazoglu, General Manager, TOCEV, commented: "In TOCEV, our mission is to bring up well-educated and social individuals with a rich cultural heritage who will work for the good of the society. We provide materials to help our children improve their intellectual vision and education, boost their creative powers and take brave steps in the future for our world. Reading is one of the most important tools to help achieve these goals. We have started our journey to make sure all our children will have the means to read and will enjoy equal opportunities. Given these facts, we are very happy to collaborate with Citi Turkey to open libraries at elementary schools."
